titles.title: Logan Reclamation and Stabilization Act

To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to designate the Logan Triangle in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as a brownfield site for purposes of the brownfields economic redevelopment initiative of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 2/15/2000--Introduced. Logan Reclamation and Stabilization Act - Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to designate the Logan Triangle in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as a brownfield site for purposes of the EPA's brownfields economic redevelopment initiative.
